subject: Running
Deaths (Fatalities)
Marathon Running
lead_paragraph: The runner who collapsed and died in Sunday’s New York City Half, a 13.1-mile run around Manhattan, has been identified as John Tanner, 46, of Marlborough, Mass.
snippet: The runner who collapsed and died in Sunday’s New York City Half, a 13.1-mile run around Manhattan, has been identified as John Tanner, 46, of Marlborough, Mass.
